scripts.test: npm run bddgen && npm run playwright-test
scripts.qa-test: npx bddgen && cross-env ENV=qa npx playwright test --headed&& npx playwright show-report&&allure generate ./allure-results -o ./allure-report&& allure open allure-reports
scripts.playwright-test: npx playwright test --reporter=html,list --headed&& npx playwright show-report && allure generate ./allure-results -o ./allure-report && allure open allure-report
